staxel.village.dialogue.CaithgirlPrimary: Ice cream, mya? I'd much rather have fish!
But fishing alone is a little bit intimidating right now mya...
Especially out in the forests...
Apparently there's some strange creature moaning and growling...
It gives me the chills mya...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
The other day I was out fishing in the ^c:1486b0;ocean^c:pop;, mya...
I hooked something really tough! It must've been massive mya!
But then something terrible happened...
My line snapped and I went tumbling over and over and over...
By the time I stopped, whatever it was had escaped, mya.
It took my ^c:d03e37;lucky hook^c:pop; with it! It must be still stuck in the creature somewhere.
I'm too scared to go back for it mya... Do you think you could...go for me?
It's pretty important mya.
Any luck finding my ^c:d03e37;lucky hook^c:pop;, mya?
I lost it somewhere out in the ^c:1486b0;ocean^c:pop;...
Is that my ^c:d03e37;lucky hook^c:pop; stuck in that ^c:d03e37;bottle^c:pop;, mya?
It definitely looks like it, mya!
Can I have that ^c:d03e37;hooked bottle^c:pop;?
Of course! But what does it say?
I don't think this is the one.
Oh... Is that so, mya?
Let me know if you find my ^c:d03e37;lucky hook^c:pop;, mya...
I... I don't want to tell you what's in the message, mya...
Not yet...
But if you can take this to ^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; for me, he'll know what to give you.
And thank you again, mya. You don't know what this ^c:d03e37;hook^c:pop; means...
Mmm... ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;. Hi, mya.
Do you have siblings, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;? Do you see them often?
I haven't seen mine in years, mya...
They don't even send messages as often anymore... Or...well...I'm not very good at finding them, mya...
Maybe... Do you think... No, mya. That would be asking too much, mya.
What's wrong?
See you around!
Okay, mya... See you around...mya.
Mmm? You actually want to know, mya? Really?
No one ever wants to know, mya...
It's a bit embarassing, but I'm not very good at fishing, mya...
My brothers and sisters send me ^c:d03e37;messages in bottles^c:pop; every now and again...
But I haven't been able to fish any of them up lately, mya...
Do you think you could help, mya?
They tend to end up in ^c:1486b0;very strange places^c:pop;, mya.
There's definitely one in ^c:1486b0;the ocean^c:pop; and one in ^c:1486b0;the lake^c:pop;, mya...
I think I also saw one in ^c:1486b0;the blueish part of the mines^c:pop;, mya...
Please bring them to me as soon as you can find them, mya.
I'll keep looking too...
It looks like you're still missing some of the letters, mya...
There should be at least three, and they should all be different, mya.
One was in ^c:1486b0;the ocean^c:pop; and another was in ^c:1486b0;the lake^c:pop;.
I think I saw one in ^c:1486b0;the blueish part of the mines^c:pop; too, mya...
Oh, you have them all, mya!
It sounds like they're doing well, mya!
But still...
There's still one more missing, mya...
I guess it's not coming...
Oh, but you did a great job, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I'll give you a little something in return, mya.
Maybe if we keep fishing it'll turn up someday, mya?
I didn't actually start fishing because I like fish, you know, mya...
But... I suppose it wasn't really for the letters either, mya...
If... If it's alright, I'll let you know if I need help again in the future, mya.
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, there's something I want to tell you, mya.
The truth is, when I first came to ^c:1486b0;Staxel^c:pop;, one of my sisters came too...
We had lots of fun, mya!
But they...they're not around any more, mya...
I don't know what happened to them. No one does, mya.
She doesn't even send messages, mya!
I need to find her, but I don't know how, mya...
I need to... I need to...
^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; travelled a lot to get here, mya. Could she have seen something?
I don't know where to find her though, mya...
Do you suppose you could take her this ^c:d03e37;note^c:pop;? You always seem to know where everyone is, mya.
You've always been a good friend, mya!
Did you find out anything from ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; mya?
Please tell me if you do!
Oh! Is that ^c:d03e37;note^c:pop; from ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop;, mya? What does it say?
So she needs a ^c:d03e37;catalyst^c:pop; to do some kind of...ritual, mya?
I hope it's not a dark ritual, mya... That sounds a bit scary...
But if you trust her, I will too, mya!
I need some time to figure out what to use as a ^c:d03e37;catalyst^c:pop;, mya...
While I think, could you make me an ^c:d03e37;incense lure^c:pop;?
It might come in handy mya...
Any luck making that ^c:d03e37;incense lure^c:pop;, mya?
I'll keep thinking while you do, mya...
Aha! I can smell that ^c:d03e37;lure^c:pop; from here, mya!
I hope you didn't start burning it already, mya...
I think I have some ideas for a ^c:d03e37;catalyst^c:pop;, but I need a little more time, mya...
For now, could you just hold on to that ^c:d03e37;lure^c:pop; for me?
Consider it part of the thanks for helping me out, mya!
Oh, and this too, mya!
Mya! ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I'd hoped you would come by...mya.
The truth is...mya. I already had an idea what to use as a ^c:d03e37;catalyst^c:pop; for ^c:1486b0;Cirahna's^c:pop; ritual, mya...
But I wanted to try and get it myself first, mya...
See... A long time ago I fought with my sister over something stupid, mya.
It was really stupid mya.
We both got angry and I...I threw away something important...
She vanished not long after that, mya...
It was my fault...
I should never have thrown that ^c:d03e37;brooch^c:pop;...
But it's the last thing left, mya. And this enormous fish jumped out of the lake and swallowed it whole...
If you could just figure out how to catch it, mya...we could find her!
You'll do it, right mya? We're best friends, aren't we mya?
Of course, mya!
I knew I could count on you, mya!
It won't be an easy task. ^c:d03e37;M'yah^c:pop; is one of the island's scariest creatures mya!
It won't come out just for anything, mya... That's why I taught you to make the ^c:d03e37;incense lure^c:pop;!
We need to set up a special ^c:1486b0;lure spot^c:pop; to draw it out mya...
We'll need an ^c:d03e37;incense lure^c:pop;, ^c:d03e37;mermaid tail^c:pop;, and ^c:d03e37;butterfly dream catcher^c:pop;, mya.
Then you take this ^c:d03e37;magic circle^c:pop; and place it on the edge of a ^c:1486b0;lake^c:pop;.
^c:1486b0;Any lake^c:pop; should do mya. ^c:d03e37;M'yah^c:pop; is a very special fish...
It can pop out of ^c:1486b0;any lake^c:pop; on the island whenever it wants, mya!
But I don't think you'll be able to catch it without the ^c:1486b0;lure spot^c:pop;... mya.
Any luck catching ^c:d03e37;M'yah^c:pop; mya?
You need to set up a special ^c:1486b0;lure spot^c:pop; to draw it out mya!
You can build it on ^c:1486b0;any lake^c:pop; and then fish there to catch it, mya!
It looks like you lost your ^c:d03e37;magic circle^c:pop; mya...
I'll give you another but please be more careful with this one mya...
Myahaha! You did it mya! You caught ^c:d03e37;M'yah^c:pop;!
Alright, let's get that ^c:d03e37;brooch^c:pop; out, mya!
Yes! This is the one, mya! A bit slimy, but still intact!
Please take that to ^c:1486b0;Cirahna's^c:pop; and see if she can use it to find my sister, mya!
I'll be waiting, mya!
Did you take the ^c:d03e37;brooch^c:pop; to ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop;, mya?
I really hope she can find my sister...
Ah! Ah! Mya! That's a letter from ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop;!
She found her? She really found her?
I...I need time to organise my thoughts, mya...
Maybe you should go tear down that special ^c:1486b0;lure spot^c:pop;...
I released ^c:d03e37;M'yah^c:pop; back into the lake and we probably don't want it coming back, mya...
Come see me again when it's done, mya.
I'm still trying to decide what to write, mya...
Come back when you've pulled down the special ^c:1486b0;lure spot^c:pop;.
I can already tell the island has become safer again, mya!
While you were busy, I wrote my letter and threw it in the ocean, mya...
I hope it reaches the right place...
All we can do now is wait, mya.
I'll let you know if I hear anything.
Thank you for all your help ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
I don't know what I would have done without you, mya...
Please, take these as a sign of my eternal friendship, mya!
Maybe we can be roomies someday, mya!
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
I finally got a reply to my letter, mya!
The handwriting was a bit strange compared to what I remember, but it's been a long time, mya!
Lots of things change with time!
I hope she decides to come back, mya!
I'm just happy to know she's out there.
Defending the village mya?
Against what? Dusty streets? Myahaha!
I'll do my best!
With the introductions out of the way, mya...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... Did you get my letter mya?
I need you to build that ^c:1486b0;fishing spot^c:pop; for me...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... I need you to build a ^c:1486b0;fishing spot^c:pop; for me...
Please... would you help me out, mya?
Sure!
Not yet...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... I need you to build that ^c:1486b0;fishing spot^c:pop; for me...
Sure!
Not yet...
I knew you’d do it, mya!
Take these ^c:d03e37;Blueprints^c:pop;, you'll need them to help me build the perfect spot.
Also you'll need to find a ^c:d03e37;barrel^c:pop; mya.
I hear ^c:1486b0;Aliza^c:pop; sells those mya. Or... I saw some lying around your farm the other day.
Oh, and take this ^c:d03e37;signpost^c:pop;, and mark the location where I can fish mya.
^c:1486b0;Max^c:pop; doesn't want me fishing just anywhere... so be sure to place this in a good spot mya!
And if you do a good job, perhaps I’ll teach you how to fish, myahaha!
Please do help soon. If you don't I might cry mya...
You don't want that... do you?
Myah, I’ve wanted a nice fishing spot for so long now.
Thanks for agreeing to build it ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
Oh no, did the ^c:d03e37;fishing spot signpost^c:pop; go missing mya?
This took me a lot of work to get... so please don't lose it again, mya!
Myah! ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
That’s far better than I hoped for, myah!
I'm so moved! I think I'll give you my old ^c:d03e37;fishing rod^c:pop;!
It's a bit worn down, but it still works fine.
Just gotta convince ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; to get me some better ^c:d03e37;fishing rods^c:pop;!
Anyway mya. Fishing is super easy! I know you'll get the hang of it in no time.
Just follow these tips I prepared for you, mya! And you can catch all sorts of tasty fish!
Thanks for setting up the fishing spot, there's never been a dedicated place for fishing around here...
I always ended up feeling like I was in the way wherever I fished, mya.
Now that we have this spot, we can fish all day, myahaha! Thanks to you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... Can you please fix my ^c:1486b0;fishing spot^c:pop;, mya...
I don't know what to do without it...
If you don't fix it... I might cry, mya...
You don't want that... do you?
Mya! Someone stole my fishing spot!
Please place this back down so I can get back to fishing mya!
This took me a lot of work to get... so please make sure it doesn't get lost or stolen again, mya!
With the introductions out of the way, mya...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... Did you get my letter mya?
You see... you were a little too slow.
You've been beaten you to the punch, mya.
So I already got a fishing spot all to myself, myahaha!
However, mya... I could get your help with something.
I love fishing so much that I tend to overdo it a bit. So...
I’ve got all this extra bait and catch, and nowhere to put it… could you make me something?
I’ve got some ^c:d03e37;Blueprints^c:pop; you’ll need… I’d like a ^c:d03e37;Bait Box^c:pop; and ^c:d03e37;Fish Rack^c:pop;
If you do a good job, maybe I’ll teach you to fish, myahaha!
Mya, I knew it!
I’ve really overdone it on these fish…
If I don’t get a ^c:d03e37;Fish Rack^c:pop; soon, I might just have to eat them all!
That actually sounds kinda good... myahahaha!
Please bring me a ^c:d03e37;Bait Box^c:pop; and ^c:d03e37;Fish Rack^c:pop; soon
Those look superb ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Myah!
I go through old fishing rods like toothpicks, why don’t you take this as a thank you...
You can have my ^c:d03e37;Old Rod^c:pop;, myah!
Fishing is super easy, I know you’ll get the hang of it in no time.
When you’ve got the hang of it, you can even buy a better ^c:d03e37;Rod^c:pop; at the ^c:1486b0;General Store^c:pop;
With the introductions out of the way, mya...
^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... Did you get my letter mya?
Would you like to help me out, mya?
Please ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... would you help me out, mya?
Sure!
Not yet...
